text: Nathan Jonas "Joey" Jordison (April 26, 1975 - July 26, 2021) was an American musician. He was the drummer for the band Slipknot. In Slipknot, he was known as #1. He was also the guitarist for Murderdolls. Jordison died on July 26, 2021 at the age of 46. He was suffering from transverse myelitis when he died. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American drummers Category:American guitarists Category:American heavy metal musicians Category:American punk musicians Category:Deaths from autoimmune disease Category:Musicians from Des Moines, Iowa Category:Slipknot members
title: Joey Jordison
